metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32250 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - high
metadata.Description:
net/netfilter/nf_tables_api.c in the Linux kernel through 5.18.1 allows alocal user (able to create user/net namespaces) to escalate privileges toroot because an incorrect NFT_STATEFUL_EXPR check leads to ause-after-free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-32250` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-117-generic - 5.4.0-117.132
linux-image-5.4.0-117-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-117.132
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-117-generic - 5.4.0-117.132
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-117-lowlatency - 5.4.0-117.132
No subscription required

linux-image-5.13.0-48-generic - 5.13.0-48.54~20.04.1
linux-image-5.13.0-48-generic-lpae - 5.13.0-48.54~20.04.1
